summary: All previously reported issues have been addressed and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Dev pepper mismatch breaks validation for pepper_version=0 keys
previous_issues_status.notes: Validation now uses the same dev fallback pepper for version 0 in non-production, matching creation behavior.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: createApiKey fails on UNIQUE key_prefix collisions without retry
previous_issues_status.notes: Collision retry loop added with bounded attempts and proper error handling.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: timingSafeEqual compares UTF-8 strings instead of hex bytes
previous_issues_status.notes: Comparison now decodes hex to bytes before constant-time comparison.
